titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1,3-Dimethyl-2-imidazolidinone.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/11/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 1,3-Dimethyl-2-imidazolidinone.
